title: Ronald Reagan: "If fascism ever comes to America, it will come in the name of liberalism."
subtitle: The former Governor of California and the future President of the United States commented during an interview in 1975 with "60 minutes" on a discussion of his economic philosophy.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Ronald Reagan said, "If fascism comes to America, it will come in the name of liberalism."
